snippet.title: Dangerous Land 0.6.0 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
⚔️ Dangerous Land is a first-person strategic game enriched with elements of exploration and action. Assume the role of the ruler of your settlement, manage and develop it in real-time, recruit and upgrade units, take care of resources, and participate in epic battles.

🟨 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348440/Dangerous_Land

🟦 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RandiGames
⬜️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/RandiGames_
🟥 Mail contact: randigamesstudio@gmail.com
